adrFormatAddress: 210 W 19th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
After every session with Hezi, I leave in awe.
Hezi has a kind soul, and this is one of the qualities that makes him an outstanding energy healer. I've been going to my sessions religiously and experiencing constant shifts in every aspect of my life.
If you are in need of a change or want to feel lighter and more vital, do yourself a favor and book a session with him. You will not regret it.

text.text:

originalText.text:
Hezi is an angel in human form, a true godsend.
After I lost my husband, I started looking into different kinds of therapy. I tried multiple healing modalities until I found Hezi, and from the first second we met, I knew he was special.
His presence is warm and inviting, and he knows how to guide me into realizing myself more and more solely by asking the right questions.
Taking the medicinal herbs to support my process at home, in addition to the affirmations and his other recommendations, made me feel like I was taking control back over my life, and it felt incredible. He has extensive knowledge of a variety of healing techniques, and I feel blessed to have met him.
Thank you, Hezi, for your service and for the incredible work that you are doing; you gave me my life back, and for that, I will always be grateful.

originalText.text:
The best of the best!
Hezi's Energy healing technique is the best I have ever experienced. The healing process keeps on happening days after the treatment! To be completely honest, I didn't feel much during our first treatment, but during the following days, things started to shift, and I was just amazed.
Since then, I have received a few more treatments by Hezi, and now I am hooked. I highly recommend it.

originalText.text: My partner and I took Hezi's vibrational healing class, and I'm happy to say that our relationship just leveled up. We understand each other better and give each other treatments once a week after a hard day of work. I love what it did to us, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone who's looking to improve their lives.
